result.execSummary:
The defendant Omero L. Espino was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
--to pay costs of $243  plus $200 DNA surcharge= $443, plus $43 in subpoena fees 

The Court orders that the Cash Bond posted in this file be applied to the costs/fees incurred; the remainder is to be returned to the surety

On Count #1 the Court sentences Mr. Espino to 9 months in the Jefferson County Jail, WITHOUT Huber/work release privileges ; this sentence is to begin FORTHWITH

On Count #1: The Court orders sex offender registry for 15 years

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Omero L. Espino

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: with elements and criminal case settlement agreement forms attached

Case called at 11:35am [mo]
Defendant Omero L. Espino in court with Attorney Erik I. Colque.   ADA Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin.

Shawna Stevenoski - sworn as Spanish Interpreter

The Court discloses that the mother of ADR is someone that the Court is familiar with because of Ms. Hernandez's work with PADA, the Court notes that its contacts have only professional in nature and does not feel any disqualification or recusal is needed.

ADA Hall verifies victim rights compliance; ADA Hall notes that at this time there is not a request to be heard

ADA Hall submits an Amended Information
recess: 11:44am-reconvene:11:45am [to allow Atty. Colque to discuss Amended Information with Mr. Espino]
--Atty. Colque admits service of Amended Information

Maximum penalties recited; Constitutional rights reviewed; pleas of " No Contest " entered on Counts #1 and #2 of the Amended Information; factual basis stipulated; the Court accepts the pleas, finds Defendant guilty, and orders Judgment of Conviction entered.

Sentencing arguments given by Counsel
Ms. Hernandez(the victim's mother) makes a statement to the Court
Statement made by Mr. Espino

On Count #1 the Court sentences Mr. Espino to 9 months in the Jefferson County Jail, WITHOUT Huber/work release privileges ; this sentence is to begin FORTHWITH

On Count #2 the Court sentences Mr. Espino to 9 months in the Jefferson County Jail, WITHOUT Huber/work release privileges; this sentence is to be served consecutive to the sentence in Count #1

On Count #1 to pay costs of $243  plus $200 DNA surcharge= $443.  
On Count #2 to pay costs of $243  plus $200 DNA surcharge= $443.
The total costs/fees from Counts #1 and #2, $886.00 plus $43 in subpoena fees is to be converted to civil judgement in favor of the county/state against Mr. Espino.

On Count #1: 4 days credit
On Count #2: 0 days credit

On Count #1: The Court orders sex offender registry for 15 years
recess: 1:05pm

[[post hearing//off record: The Court resinds its order for entry of Civil Judgement and orders that the Cash Bond posted in this file be applied to the costs/fees incurred; the remainder is to be returned to the person who posted]]
State's notice of intent to admit statements made by the defendant
Proposed Stip and order for continuance
Proposed stip and order for continuance

Case called at 10:30am [mo]
Defendant Omero L. Espino in court with Attorney Erik I. Colque.   ADA Jeffrey Shock appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Shawna Stevenoski--sworn as Spanish Interpreter

Atty. Colque indicates that a resolution has not been reached at this time and requests a further status conference.
The Court informs Counsel that due the charges this case must be expedited and therefore will be scheduled for FSSC and Jury Trial.
Atty. Colque requests a two day jury trial.
recess: 10:36am

NEXT: (1) FSSC:August 3, 2015 at 1:00pm (2) JURY TRIAL: August 6 and 7, 2015 at 8:30am(send notices)
Status conference on June 2, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Case called at 3:06pm [mo]
Defendant Omero L. Espino in court with Attorney Erik I. Colque.   ADA Jeffrey Shock appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Shawna Stevenoski continues under oath as Spanish Interpreter.

Mr. Espino waives his right to Preliminary Hearing; the Court accepts this waiver and binds him over for Trial.

Arraignment:
--service of Information admitted, reading waived
--the charge and maximum penalties are recited
--plea of "not guilty" entered
recess: 3:15pm

NEXT:   (1) Pretrial Conference on 4/29/15 at 9:00am     (2) Status Conference on 6/2/15 at 10:30am
Waiver of Prelim on April 17, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Waiver of Prelim on April 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on March 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Case called at 1:23 pm [Clerk SH]
Defendant Omero L. Espino appears in custody, via video, from the Jefferson County Jai with Attorney Erik I. Colque. Public Service Special Prosecutor, Melanie Flint, appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Shawna Stevenoski sworn as Spanish Interpreter.
Court finds the proceedings are sight and sound sufficient

Atty Colque presents objection to sufficiency of complaint
Court orders that by Wednesday end of business, Atty Colque file motion re: objection to jurisdiction

Service of Complaint admitted; reading waived; maximum penalties recited
Preliminary Hearing time limits waived upon agreement of parties 

Court requires a $3500 CASH bond, with conditions:
-No contact with A.D.R. (dob: 1/1/02) or Irma Hernandez
-No presence at 214 Brad St. Johnson Creek
-No physical contact with non-familial child
-Booking at JCSD 
Recess: 1:31 pm 

NEXT: (1) Schedule Preliminary Hearing 3/23/15 at 9:00 am - Send notices **Atty Cloque does have conflicts this day, but will try to re-arrange calendar**
